## ğŸ“ˆ How Badges Are Awarded

### Automatic Badges
Some badges are awarded automatically by our system:
- First Launch
- Post count milestones (Communicator, Super Contributor)
- Code Contributor (via GitHub integration)

### Manual Badges
Others require moderator review:
- Subject Expert (nominated by community)
- Mentor (verified by moderators)
- Star Contributor (quarterly review)

### Self-Nominate
Think you've earned a badge? Comment below with:
- Badge name
- Evidence (links to contributions)
- Why you qualify

We'll review within 1 week!

## â“ FAQ

**Q: Can I lose badges?**
A: Only for Code of Conduct violations. We don't revoke for inactivity.

**Q: Do badges expire?**
A: No! Once earned, always earned.

**Q: Can I display multiple badges?**
A: Yes! Collect them all. Top 3 display prominently.

**Q: Are badges required to participate?**
A: Absolutely not! Badges are optional recognition. Contribute at your comfort level.
